Reference

Import metadata

All functions in this category are to be applied to a single metadata file

jst_get_article()

Extract meta information for articles

jst_get_authors()

Extract author information

jst_get_book()

Extract meta information for books

jst_get_chapters()

Extract information on book chapters

jst_get_footnotes()

Extract all footnotes

jst_get_references()

Extract all references

Batch import many files

jst_import() jst_import_zip()

Wrapper for file import

jst_define_import()

Define an import specification

Re-import files after batch conversion

jst_re_import()

Re-import files

jst_combine_outputs()

Combine outputs from converted files

Import full-text/ngram

jst_get_full_text()

Import full-text

jst_get_ngram()

Read ngram data

jst_subset_ngrams()

Define a subset of ngrams

Augmentations

jst_augment()

Clean data from DfR

jst_clean_page()

Clean a character vector of pages

jst_unify_journal_id()

Unify journal IDs

jst_add_total_pages()

Add total count of pages

jst_get_total_pages()

Calculate total pages

Helper functions

jst_get_file_name()

Extract the basename of a path

jst_example()

Get path to jstor example

jst_preview_zip()

Preview content of zip files

jst_get_journal_overview()

Get table with information on journals
